document_data.mainbody:
Buff Tanner was a patron of the Elfsong Tavern in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Buff Tanner was a human male with a dark skin tone, dark brown eyes, and black hair he kept slicked back. His beard and mustache were well-trimmed.
In the , Buff Tanner was a frequent customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the Eastway neighborhood of Baldurs Gate. He could often be found in the large company of friends, including Cyndirie Vand, occupying one of the large guest tables at the tavern. Like every citizen of the Gate, Buff had strong opinions on the refugee crisis caused by the Cult of the Absolute. He claimed to feel bad for all those displaced refugees but thought it was not the citys responsibility to take them all in, believing that it was the plan of the Absolute to destabilize the city and drain its resources.
